snippet: Former France soccer great Raymond Kopa, who won three European Cups with Real Madrid in the 1950s, died at the age of 85 on Friday....

headline.main: North Korean Suspect in Airport Murder to Be Deported From Malaysia and Not Allowed Back
headline.print_headline: North Korean Suspect in Airport Murder to Be Deported From Malaysia and Not Allowed Back

lead_paragraph: Former France soccer great Raymond Kopa, who won three European Cups with Real Madrid in the 1950s, died at the age of 85 on Friday.
